description: This file contains utility functions for handling recipe data, including searching, filtering, and generating filter options. It defines data types (for Ingredients, Nutrition, and Recipe) and includes functions to build searchable text, filter recipes based on user criteria, and create filter option lists from a set of recipes.

methods.name: buildSearchText(recipe)
methods.description: Creates a normalized, searchable string (blob) from a recipe object, combining title, description, ingredients, tags, cuisine, and difficulty to facilitate full-text search.

methods.name: filterRecipes(recipes, params)
methods.description: Filters an array of recipes based on search parameters such as query text, cuisine, difficulty, and dietary restrictions.

methods.name: buildFilterOptions(recipes)
methods.description: Generates sorted, unique lists of available options for cuisines, difficulties, and dietary tags from a collection of recipes.
